channel.title: Fredisodes
channel.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
channel.itunes:summary: In 2005, Freddy had it all including the year's biggest record deal. Two months later, his record label merged with another and he was dropped. Fast forward to 2008, Kidd Kraddick, host of the largest Top 40 radio show in America happens across Freddy's MySpace page. Kidd invited Freddy to play on his show if he can get from his school in Pennsylvania to Dallas in five days. Follow Freddy as he travels to Dallas, performs on Kidd’s show and starts the process of recording his debut album right there in the station’s studio.
channel.description: Follow Freddy as he records his debut album with Kidd Kraddick.

item.title: Fredisode No. 17
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: Freddy takes his first Walmart trip ever!
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Walmart, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 16
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: In his latest video, Freddy shows how a song that he’s already written can be reworked into something even better.
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Even If, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 15
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: Freddy shows off his favorite guitars and plays a bit of Something About That Girl. Check out his sweet computer program that lets him record all of his awesome music!
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Playing Guitar, Gibson, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 14
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: Freddy breaks down Defying Gravity in his apartment. Watch as he shows off the chords for the song so you can learn to play it too!
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 12
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: Freddy invites some choir girls to learn some harmonies for Defying Gravity, which they got to show off on stage with Freddy at the Texas Bar and Grill show!
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 11
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: Freddy drives down to San Antonio with the rest of the morning show crew to play at Mixfest with Maroon 5, Secondhand Serenade, Simple Plan, Colbie Callait, and Ryan Cabrera!
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Mixfest, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 10
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: Freddy tries on outfits for his concert at the hip clothing store LFT!
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, LFT, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 9
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: Freddy comes up with the idea to write a Mother’s Day song for his mom. Kidd calls her up during the show so Freddy can play his original tune for her, but little does Freddy know that Kidd had a BIG surprise waiting for him. Watch as Freddy is completely blown away by his mom appearing in the studio!
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Mother's Day, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 8
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: Freddy, while live on the air, performs out of the back of a truck in the drive-thru line at McDonald’s! He makes up a little diddy about going to jail in hopes of entertaining the cop watching nearby.
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Freddy Needs Gas,Drive-thru, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 7
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: Freddy walks around promoting his show at Texas Bar and Grill. Watch as he persuades the friendly people of Dallas on the streets, in their cars, and at the mall to come to his concert! He completely filled the place with fans and signed autographs for almost 4 hours after the show!
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Freddy Needs Gas,Dallas, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 6
item.itunes:author: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.dc:creator: Freddy and Kidd Kraddick
item.itunes:summary: Day 3 - Freddy performs in the middle of a mall during his trek to Dallas. He stayed for two hours after the show to sign autographs, collect gas money, receive blankets for the U-Haul, take pictures, and make a 5 year old’s dream come true!
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Freddy Needs Gas, Mall, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity

item.title: Fredisode No. 5

item.description: Chris the Camera Man and Freddy
item.itunes:summary: Chris the Camera Man makes a public service announcement about speeding while on the road with Freddy!
item.itunes:keywords: Freddy, Fredisode, Freddy Needs Gas, Kidd Kraddick, Kidd, Defying Gravity, Gravity
